mapper.update: UPDATE EKA.LST_SPICA_FORM SET LSPC_FORM_TYPE = #{lspc_form_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_FORM_DESCRIPTION = #{lspc_form_description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_FORM_SOURCE = #{lspc_form_source, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_FORM_PRIMARY_ATTRIBUTE = #{lspc_form_primary_attribute, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_FORM_MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE, LSPC_FORM_MODIFIED_BY = #{lspc_form_modified_by, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE LSPC_FORM_ID = #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND LSPC_FORM_FLAG_ACTIVE = 1

UPDATE EKA.LST_SPICA_FIELD A SET A.LSPC_FIELD_MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE, A.LSPC_FIELD_MODIFIED_BY = #{lspc_field_modified_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, A.LSPC_FIELD_FLAG_ACTIVE = 0 WHERE A.LSPC_FORM_ID = #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT B.COLUMN_NAME FROM ALL_TAB_COLS B WHERE OWNER = 'EKA' AND TABLE_NAME = #{lspc_form_source, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND COLUMN_ID IS NOT NULL AND A.LSPC_FIELD_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME )

UPDATE EKA.LST_SPICA_RULE SET LSPC_RULE_DESCRIPTION = #{lspc_rule_description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_RULE_EXPRESSION = #{lspc_rule_expression, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_RULE_ERROR_MSG = #{lspc_rule_error_msg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_RULE_MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE, LSPC_RULE_MODIFIED_BY = #{lspc_rule_modified_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, LSPC_RULE_PREREQUISITES = #{lspc_rule_prerequisites, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_RULE_CATEGORY_ID = #{lspc_rule_category_id, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE LSPC_FORM_ID = #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND LSPC_RULE_NAME = #{lspc_rule_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND LSPC_RULE_FLAG_ACTIVE = 1

UPDATE EKA.LST_SPICA_LIST SET LSPC_LIST_DESCRIPTION = #{lspc_list_description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_LIST_SOURCE = #{lspc_list_source, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_LIST_FIELD_NAME = #{lspc_list_field_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_LIST_FIELD_TYPE = #{lspc_list_field_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSPC_LIST_MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE, LSPC_LIST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lspc_list_modified_by, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE LSPC_LIST_NAME = #{lspc_list_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND LSPC_LIST_FLAG_ACTIVE = 1
